document_data.name: E'nukka Suindu Inn
document_data.mainbody: The '''E'nukka Suindu Inn''' was an inn in the [[T'u Lung]] city of [[Balanzia]] around {{YearlinkConvert|2310|SY}}.
document_data.Location: This inn was located in the western portion of Balanzia, down the street from the home of [[keno]] the [[moneylending|moneylender]] and next to the wall that surrounded the castle of the [[E'tuing clan]].
document_data.History: Around {{YearlinkConvert|2403|SY}}, the E'nukka Suindu Inn was one of many buildings that were destroyed in Balanzia as the city fell at the hands of the [[Shou Lung]] invasion of T'u Lung.The E'nukka Suindu Inn is not explicitly stated in text to have been destroyed in the incident that destroyed the city. However, on the "before-and-after" maps of Balanzia in ''[[Kara-Tur: The Eastern Realms]]'' the building is not present on the "after" version. Therefore, it can be inferred that it was likely destroyed.
